SENIOR ASSOCIATE

Seasoned Financial Markets professional with over 12 years of experience in Global Financial Markets Sales & Trading across the Corporate and Institutional space in India.

Demonstrated ability to deliver solutions to clients, based on excellent analytical skills.   Compatibility for both, independent and teamwork.
Project management

Helped grow bank's Global Markets revenue by 200 % from $ 0.5M to $ 1.5M
Acquired 20 new clients in the past year, with total trading volume of $10B through professional networking, loan reviews and marketing

City

Communicated regularly with management regarding portfolio performance and new loan transaction quality
​
Interpreted data on price, yield, stability, future investment-risk trends, economic influences and other factors affecting investment programs
Involvement in product structuring function to offer tailor made products to clients to meet internal & regulatory requirements.
Active involvement in developing and launching of new products to increase and strengthen client engagement Followed Global Service Delivery approach to capitalize on off-shore business opportunities with clients having a multi geographical presence Investigated red flags for fraud, embezzlement, money laundering, tax evasion, false accounting statements, organized crime, terrorist financing and insider trading as a part of new client engagement
Assisted senior-level credit officers with complex loan applications
Providing a strong back up to the trading/ALM desk and also manage the execution and lay-off of risk from the trading book

Company Name
City

Monitoring of the Net Open Position (NOP) and Aggregate Gap Limit (AGL) limits for the bank.
Developing the pricing mechanism and actively managing the entire process flow for launch of electronic trading platform.
Franchise building by regularly interacting with Sales and Clients.
Participate in various activities to help offshore counterparts to understand and undertake activities in the Indian financial markets.
Providing inputs to the daily market commentary and other research publications.

City

<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Accountant - West Omaha Headquarters - One of Nebraska’s Best Corporations - HEMPHILL EXCLUSIVE!

Location: Omaha, NE

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Analyst, Finance

Description:
Senior Accountant - West Omaha Headquarters - One of Nebraska’s Best Corporations - HEMPHILL EXCLUSIVE! We are proud to partner with one of Nebraska’s best corporations while selecting a Senior Accountant who will work at this company’s home office in West Omaha. This industry leader is highly profitable, stable, known for their excellent training, warm & engaging culture, lucrative benefits, 40 hour work week, and continued career opportunities for high performing employees.  Enjoy a broad range of responsibility while focused on journal entries, general ledger reconciliations, month-end close, post-close financial analysis, and accounting and analysis tied to project accounting for new capital projects. 
This leadership team is committed to hiring high caliber individuals, providing excellent training, and mentoring team members with an excellent balance of challenge and empowerment so each individual strives toward their full potential. 
Scope of Responsibilities:Enjoy a wide array of responsibilities related to month-end close, financial reporting, post-close financial analysis, and project accounting related to fixed assets.Take an active role in preparing monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements.Review actual financial results vs. plan then present conclusions to management while discussing options to improve efficiency and profitability. Enjoy being a part of a company with an excellent partnership between operations and accounting & finance where all are focused on optimizing efficiency and profitability.
Enjoy exceptional benefits, a retirement package second to none, excellent work life balance, continued career growth and promotions based upon your performance, a beautiful West Omaha office, and a casual dress code.
To learn more about this position call Austin Hemphill at 402.334.4800 *246 or send an e-mail to ahemphill@hemphillsearch.com to learn more. Job # 9277AH
The Right Match - The First Time
Your Confidentiality is Our Priority; Hemphill will NOT Forward Your Resume Without Your Approval.
To see all Hemphill job postings go to www.hemphillsearch.com
Hemphill Voted – “Best Employment Firm” by Omaha’s Business Leaders & B2B Magazine in 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022 & 2023!
Omaha Chamber of Commerce Top 25 – “Excellence in Business Award Winner” based upon our growth and commitment to quality.
*** Never a fee to our applicants ***

Experience Level (if available): Associate
<JD_END>
